episodes.title: Scientology Destroyed Our Families; Surviving the Grief and Loss!
episodes.description: We survived Scientology after they destroyed our families! Join me and Jeff as we chat about the grief and loss and how we have recovered.

episodes.title: Scientology:  "Put Your Manner In"
episodes.description: Join me and Jeff and as discuss how Scientology creates control freaks and obsessively calls their people out publicly!

episodes.title: How ETHICS CONDITIONS keep Scientologists in line
episodes.description: Please join us while we discuss the Scientology Ethics conditions. This "technology" is used to control and manipulate members to keep them in line.  Similar techniques have been used by the Chinese Communists Party called :ideological remolding or ideological reform.

episodes.title: Kim grew up in Scientology now she's speaking out.
episodes.description: She's grew up in Scientology at a very young age and suffered abuse at the hands of Scientology.  Forty years later she is speaking out about her experience.

episodes.title: Revealing the TRUTH of being on Scientology Staff
episodes.description:
Jeff and I will discuss what it's REALLY like to be on staff in a Class 5 org.  We'll tell you about the good, the bad and the ugly!

My channel is solely fan funded so please feel free to support the cause by buying me a coffee:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/escapingthy

episodes.title: Canadian sued Scientology and won!
episodes.description:
Lorna is a Canadian who was in Scientology for many years.  She was in the Sea Organization was on staff in Vancouver and sued the Cult in Canada and won!  She is a victim of the cult in more ways than you can count! She got out and has written several sci-fi fantasy books much of which are based on her experiences in Scientology.

link to Lorna's website: https://www.lornajcarleton.com/
